entry.title: Tuesday: Fog dissipating. High plus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
